io.micronaut.core.reflect

Interface ClassLoadingReporter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, Toggleable
    Deprecated. 
    Replaced by compile time computation

    @Deprecated
public interface ClassLoadingReporter
extends java.lang.AutoCloseable, Toggleable
    An interface that can be implemented by classes that wish to listen to the classloading requirements for the an application. The close() method will be called when the application terminates.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
